text: anika idam denawada koheda kindamanda mokuth api danne naha.
aya dan wenath aya kara yannata mana balanawa da’yi api nodanimu.
eya montisori gihin wadiwela hitiye ‘go kat’ ekaka.
dan thopi mokada kiyanne.....rata pawa dun pahara ballane...
madhya thaman wikinemin kalakarayawa wikunanawa.
ee ena atharamagadi thamayi apata badulla desin kolambaa bala yana kochchiyak idalgashinna dumriya sthanayata enawath daka ganna puluwan wune.
me mu.aru neme.mama.aru.mu.aruwath mama.aru issara tikak dannawa.awurudu thunakata pera uyapuwa frisaren aragena mayikrowew dala walandina eka waradak nadda?
wiyadama simawakin thorayi.
waw…supiri thuwakku tika aa..
bibisi 'sunakha prajawa'
danuma beda ganima kiyanne samaja deshapalana wagakimak.
eeta wada api hithannawath bari kshethrawalata hithanna bari dewal siddha wenawa.
enam lankawe piriminge lingika sankethayanya.
umbaa hitiye na..
namuth ese thibiyadith apata usas pelata awashya ema kotas ethuma ma adhyayanaya kara apata ithama manawin pahada dena ladi.

me athara maha banku bandumkara wanchawa pilibanda sewime janadhipathi komisame warthawehi saha barapathala wancha dushana rajya sampath anisi lesa bhawitha kirima sambandhayen pathkarana lada janadhipathi komisame warthawehi athulath karunu pilibanda parlimenthu wiwadayak pawathwana lesa shri lanka nidahas pakshaya illimak kara atha.
eewagema hamadama diwya sathprasada labaganimata pera thamunge paw walata pasuthawili wela sudanam wenna oona.
kese namuth awasanaye engalanthaye norman saha saksan sanskruthin ekineka awashoshanaya wiya.
watina upades tikak..godak sthuthiyi battita :)
“mama dannawa me mukuth oyata mathaka natha bawa.
nathinam yam deyak gana wenath piyekge adahas laba ganna.
ee nisa ee sambandhayen muhunupothehi yam satahanak thabiya yuthu yayi sithe.
ohu sathura athata path wanne da janathawa sathurata labadun sahayogaya nisa ya.
dan keneku prashnayak asiya haka, “pala yayi adahas karanne kumakda?”
homo sepiyanla wana apata loku balaporoththu, sihina thibe.
ithiri dolosdahen 25kata kamata saha inna yana wiyadama godadaganna puluwan.
"mama uyanawa thamuseta pennadda.
dan ganige puke hilath huththath dekama sewala nisa dilisenawa.

mokada api kisima kenek samajaya idiriye aathmarthakamik wenna kamathi naha, apita ape prathirupaya bohoma wadagath nisawena api hamoma kisiyam widihaka mawa pamak jiwithaye karala nathi wenna baha newa…
habayi mama eewa idiripath karala thibbe naha.
palamu siris eka balala dewani siris eka balanawanam uparima rasawindanayak labanna puluwan.
ewelehi therunwahanse wadala bas asu dutugamunu maharajjuruwo aakashayata maldam sayak damannata sammatha kalaha.
amme mama muna balagena kathakaranna puluwan fon ekak gaththa.
bahira sanyojana thamayi amma thaththa du putha.ee kerehi thiyena chandaya thamayi chandaragaya thamayi kamaththa thamayi alima bandima thamayi “mama” kiyala aragaththama abhyanthara sanyojanaya.
ara anthima adahasa nam wadagath.
hari santhosayi monawa karannada sithale marenna denna ba ne .
chanda dayakayin sankhyawa 1,049,160ki.
awasana washayen me siddhiye saranshayak gaththoth?

lakunu 59 kata kadulu hatharak dawi thibiyadi paswani kadulla sadaha lakunu 53 ka sambandhathawayak pawathwimata sammu ashan (30) saha chathuranga da silwa (34) samathwu athara nawawani kadulla sadaha wegawath pithiharambaayaka nirathawu akila dhananjaya (24) saha malinda pushpakumara (15) pandu 29 kadi lakunu 43 sambandhathawayak pawathwuwada jayagrahanayata eya pramanawath nowiya.
ra powala nalagiri atha ewanna kiyanna api nemeyi duwanne.
unda jiwitheta iskolekata paya thiyalawath na.
ohu ee kale mage pinthura aran denawa rasika rasikawiyanta yawanna.
shri lankawe pradipagara balanna yamu.
'yamak amathaka wuna' wage podi rangapamakin passe ohu lehesiyenma basayen bassa.

maha janayata miladi ganimata ida thibiya yuththe kumana ahara da yannath maha janaya wawagena pamanak aharayata gath yuththe kumana aaharada kiya nithi panawimata deshapalanagnyayinta ayithiyak thibiya yuthuya kiya marwin chinthanaya piliganiyi.
appachchige thiranaya jiwitheta wenas wenne na....
habayi mahaththaya hari sawuththu unoth mata hadanna puluwan.
ussagena aapu hama dema bima thiyala me baren nidahas wena hatiyak kalpana karana mata wena kisima deyak epa.
manda yath apa danna handunana malkanthi jayasinha harunu kala, sesu siyallo adhyaksha prathibhawehi apuru maharu pala se apata penena bawini.
ha!!! (16+) tharakawak yata
akarathabba, linga, wala, diya yuththa ha nodiya yuththa gana adahasak athiwa ho nathiwa owun aadhara ekathu karathi.
kisindu hethuwak matha bhashanaye nidahasa saha siwil sanwidhana wisin pawathwanu labana janatha sammelana mese palanaya kirimata naithika balayak nomathi bawa da ohu pawasa atha.
ee tharam nihandathawaka, rayaka...
kalayak ohoma giya.
mama mage sanskruthiya anuwa pilithurak denawa.

niwi sanasille, abudabi bala yana yanayata ya haki lesath, anthima mohothe abhyanthara guwan gaman pramada wimen ho awalangu kirimen athiwiya haki gatalu manga harima pinisath, aya awashya welawata wada paya kihipayak kalin ehi langawimata kamathi wuwaya.
ada wana wita lankawe menma lokaye boho ratawalada karyala thula
ah me thiyenne masej eka.
lunu padamata ath dayi balanna
eka thanakata gihilla na.
namuth karunu boho danimi.
rathri dahaya kanisama wadeddi, nishadige sohoyura hitiye kamatha mada thibunu karaththayak langa.
namudu nuthana yugayehi eya hudek bhauthika diyunuwa pamanak dakwa athishayinma patuwa ha laghuwa thibe.
habayi eeka epa wune menna me hethuwa nisayi.
senadhi nayaka mahinda rajapaksha mahatha ha hitapu aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha rata wenuwen kala kapakirima…
pasugiya agosthu 23 da hawas kalaye thama niwase gettuwe siti uga්ra wisha sahitha sarpayaku dashta kirima nisa aya jiwithakshayata path wuwaya.
kalagunaya thawaduratath ralu weyi - rathnapura kalapa thunaka pasal wase
oya kiyanne man borukarayek kiyalada?
wadi hariyak kale ithin manamali andapu ekita pathuru yanna banina eka.
"ane ohoma ahanna epa sulo.mata baninna ayi mehema deyak karagaththe kiyala mata baninna..ohoma katha karaddi mata marenna hithenawa sulo."
wada wadiyen karathi.
janathawata bara lesa patawana de amunuma lesa denawa.
oba mulinma narambau sangithamaya sinamapataya kumakda ?

eeth gamana iwara wenna kittuwa rel pare paththakin gahala thibuna li puwaruwaka thibuna wachana tika kiyewwama ape kandayame kello tika chakithayaka ta pathwunath bahutharayak kollanta thibune kuthuhalayak.
in ugath padam sadathanika ya.’’

ee ekkama me kalapaya mayim wena haldummulla rakshithaya gharma kalapiya ratawala thiyena sawana wanantharayaka lakshana pennum karana nisa eeka godak wadagath wagema aaraksha karanna piyawara aran thiyena bawa apith ekka hitapu wana sanrakshana departhamenthuwe mithurek kiwwa.

nalaka saha amarasinha yana niladharihu siddhiya sambandhayen wadidura wimarshana pawathwathi.chaya - dumindu wanigasekara thiru lipi
hamadama wage ithin adath thisa dila thiyenawa kudu wendama sinduwak.di di gunasena kiyanne yogiyata nan hamadamath wirayek.
daru­wan rogin wenawa.
hasitha boyagoda (116) saha dhananjaya lakshan (98) palamu kadulla wenuwen lakunu 218ka warthagatha sambandhathawak godananwamin shri lanka jayagrahanaye niyamuwan bawata pathwuha.
wenasata pana dunne ee maha balawath sudu mahathun bawayi.
nathnam eetath wadiya.
papandu pitiyakata wada wishalathwayen wadi, lowa methek nishpadanaya wu dawanthama guwan yanaya pilibanda lokayagema awadhanaya yomu wuna.
ehi jiwa gunaya dan bihiwena atham rupa rachana padawalata galapenne naha.
ajithaya eeta passe kiwwa, na ban aththamayi..onna asoka nangiwa dakka dawasata umbaatama peneyi eya ali pite gihilla thiyanawada nadda kiyala.."

eheth trotski thama jiwithaye 1923-1940 awasan 17 wasara thula athpath kara gath deya enam loka samajawadi wiplawaya stalinwadaya wisin pawadimata erehiwa ohu gena giya aprathihatha aragalaya, 20 wana pamanak nowa 21wana shathawarshayedi shreshtathama ha wadagathma wiplawawadi chinthakaya lesa ohuge amaraniya bhawaya sahathika kale ya.
ayawaya chanda wimasima adayi..

ohuge dewani blog satahana thula ohu siya mul lipiye dosha yalith sidukarayi: 1979 irana wiplawaya ehi aithihasika sandarbhaya thula wibhaga kirimata ho ehi samaja gathikayan pariksha kirimata ohu asamath weyi.
eka athakata hari.
miya gihin neme marala dala.
ma mage mawage maranayata nogiya puwatha, pasuda marith ekka nannata giya puwatha sayima ma ipadennatath kalin ehi sandahan kara thibini.
samahara wita ee thiyena deyakata wada nathi deka watinakama danena nisa wennathi.
ee nisama wenna athi api wenas dewal karanna pelambaune.
ewani illimak kara yannata kamkaru panthiyata sidu wuye jayawardhana aanduwa wiwrutha aarthikaya handunwa demin kamkaru panthiya matha adhika jiwana bara patawima nisaya.
sujja ge handunwadimen pasuwa , karanna kathawak sirata idiripath wela thibbe natha .

janatha wimukthi peramuna wisin palana balaya hebawu thissamaharama pa්radeshiya sabhawa 2011 wasaredi sandhanayata parajaya wuye ema aanduwe yudha jayaga්ranaye rashmiya nisa saha ekala janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha hambanthota wima nisa yayi janatha wimukthi peramunu mantha්ri sunil hadunneththi mahatha wisin mathukarana lada tharkayak piwithuru hela urumaye nayaka udaya gammanpila mahatha wisin mathu karana lada pa්rabala pa්rathi tharkayak nisa jawipe mantha්riwarayata kata uththara nathi wiya.
adatath mama widudaye adhyapanaya hamara nokala shishyayek.,ethaketa oba upadhiya laba gaththe?

owunge anga tikak wenas.
me siyawas wissakata adhika kalayak jathiyak lesa sinhalaya prakata kala lakshanaya ma nowe da ?
manthrinta wiweka ganna mathisabaya kal damma
meka matama hithuna wachanayak.
janapathi-agamathi amathiwarunge banar, katawut ratapura..
switsarlanthaye swabhawika waidya paryeshakayin kandayamak wisin sidukala parikshanayakin anathuruwa delum …
me tharuniya mohuge sithuwili ude sawasa uddipanaya karayi.
ee wenuwata pradhana parata watenna hari pare yanawanam kilo mitar ekaha marak withara yanna oona..
api me thanathuruwalata aawe ape rata rakaganna.
wasanawata dahahathe thiyena awadanama theram gaththa mahinda janadhipathithuma me ugula kriyathmaka kale nana.
kese namuth ratin pita wimata awasara dena bawata sahathikayak nathi nam yalith rusiyawata noyana bawayi, kadarkowuski pawasanne.
aa eyata ekahela wiruddha wiya.

hiru rupawahiniye pawathi ‘hang tok’ wadasatahanedi ohu kiya sitiye thaman sama dinama rathri nindata yaddi prarthana karanne me sammuthi aanduwan awasan wi eksath jathika pakshaye aanduwak hadenna kiya bawath ude nagitila aden bahinneth ada dawasa athulatha meka iwarawela eksath jathika pakshaye aanduwa bihiwennayi pathamin bawathya.

sinhala bhashawe pawathna shabda dhwaniya ha artha dhwaniya swakiya matha්ranoikmawa sammilanaya wu padyamaya awasthawak meyin dakwe.

paminilla wenuwen 2008 juli masa 25 wana dina winditha dariya lamarakshaka adhikariye kantha polis kosthapal (4449) janaki saha upa polis parikshika malani yana mahathmin athara mema aparadhayata adalawa jathika lamarakshaka adhikariye shrawanagarayedi 1995 anka 14 darana sakshi wishesha widhiwidhana panathe 163 ee waganthiya yatathe pawathwana lada sammukha sakachchawe widiyo sakshiya saha ehi mudritha pitapatha idiripath kara athi bawath, sampurna naduwama ema widiyogatha sakshiya matha randapawathina bawath, thinduwa prakashayata pathkaramin winisuruwaraya prakasha karana ladi.
ehidi prashna asimata awasthawak nolabuna da, pasu dinakadi ee pilibanda wiwada kirime awasthawa labagatha hakiya.
